hero.title: X Profile Menu
hero.subtitle: Chrome Browser Extension
hero.description: Quickly access Posts, Replies, Highlights, Articles, Media, and Likes through a convenient hover menu on any Twitter Profile button. Left-click for direct access, right-click for iframe preview.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Explore our powerful features that make your X.com experience more convenient and efficient

hoverMenu.title: Hover Shortcut Menu
hoverMenu.description: Hover over Profile button to quickly access all functional pages

dualMode.title: Dual Access Mode
dualMode.description: Left-click for direct navigation, right-click for iframe preview, meeting different usage scenarios

openSource.title: Open Source Project
openSource.description: Fully open source, transparent and secure, community-driven continuous improvement

easyInstall.title: Easy Installation
easyInstall.description: One-click installation, no complex configuration required, enjoy convenience immediately

regularUpdates.title: Regular Updates
regularUpdates.description: Continuously optimize features, ensuring perfect compatibility with the latest X.com version

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Feel free to contact me and share your thoughts and suggestions. I highly value every user's feedback, let's make this extension better together

email.title: Email Contact
email.description: For any questions or suggestions, feel free to email me anytime. I will reply to your message as soon as possible.

twitter.title: Follow My X
twitter.description: Get the latest updates and technical insights, learn about the stories and technical details behind the extension development.

github.title: View Source Code
github.description: Fully open source project, welcome community contributions and improvements. View code, submit PRs, let's make the project better together.

donation.title: Support Me
donation.message: If this extension is helpful to you, welcome to support my development work through the following ways!
donation.description: Your donation will help me continue to improve and maintain this project, providing better experiences for more users. Every support is my motivation to move forward!

download.title: Download & Install
download.subtitle: Experience the convenient operations brought by X Profile Menu right now

installation.title: Installation Instructions
installation.step1: Click the button above to go to Chrome Web Store
installation.step2: Click 'Add to Chrome' button to complete installation
installation.step3: Visit X.com, hover your mouse over any Profile button to use

tips.title: Usage Tips
tips.tip1: Left-click menu items: Open corresponding page directly in current tab
tips.tip2: Right-click menu items: Preview page content in iframe popup
tips.tip3: Supports all Profile buttons on X.com, including username links in tweets

footer.description: Simplify your X.com social media experience with one-click access to profile pages.
footer.copyright: © 2024 X Profile Menu. All rights reserved.
